DOC.brief_summary: To assess whether the drug ketamine given prior to cardiopulmonary bypass can decrease injury to the cells in the brain.
DOC.brief_title: Use of Ketamine Prior to Cardiopulmonary Bypass in Children
DOC.criteria: less than one year of age undergoing cardiac surgery for repair of ventricular septal defect requiring cardiopulmonary bypass not requiring retrogrades cerebral perfusion Downs Syndrome
